definition: not having to worry about clothes and food (idiom)/to be provided with the basic necessities
to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning

sentences.english: Later the family live in wu need not founded.
sentences.chinese: 以后全家住在武南庄衣食无忧。

sentences.english: He received them, Lin Dong enough to live comfortably after six months of life.
sentences.chinese: 因为得到她们的接济，董林过了半年衣食无忧的生活。

sentences.english: If I win the lottery, I will be set up for life.
sentences.chinese: 假设我中彩票了，我下辈子就衣食无忧了。

sentences.english: She imagined her life without worrying about clothes and food.
sentences.chinese: 她设想衣食无忧的生活。

definition: brocade garments, jade meals (idiom); a life of luxury/extravagance
glory, splendor, wealth and rank (idiom); high position and great wealth
to live comfortably/happy and prosperous life
lit. ten thousand strings of cash in money belt (idiom); carrying lots of money/extremely wealthy/loaded
lit. the divine steed Feihuang gallops (idiom)/fig. to achieve meteoric success in one's career
to be successful in business/professional success
